page.title: 18Recreation, Golf, Gorleston.
page.content: Gorleston Golf Club is bounded to the south by the Norfolk/Suffolk boundary & to the east by the sea. Visitors to the golf course should look for the directions sign at the junction at Links Road with the A12. Which is about \ a mile south of the Gorleston built up well. The course is laid out along tall cliffs, & from every hole is a splendid view of the North sea. With fairly open fairways & few severe hazards, it is well suited for holiday golfers while remaining a challenge for the low handicap player.
